summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley, dated May 21, 2009. The email discusses confidential matters related to JPMorgan Chase, indicating a request for confidential treatment of certain information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating his involvement in discussions related to JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, suggesting a professional relationship with Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are engaged in a professional correspondence regarding confidential matters.

keyFacts: The email was sent on May 21, 2009.
The subject of the email indicates a request for confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.
The email is part of a larger set of documents related to Epstein's financial dealings.
